thread.title: Kansas City suburb has one of most charming Main Streets in US, ranking says
thread.title_full: Kansas City suburb has one of most charming Main Streets in US, ranking says

author: Heidi Schmidt
title: Kansas City suburb has one of most charming Main Streets in US, ranking says
text: PARKVILLE, Mo. (KCTV) - A Kansas City suburb known for it’s charm has some new bragging rights. Mixbook , a photo book company, just ranked what it believes are cities with America’s Most Charming Main Streets . Parkville , Mo. came in at No. 68 on the list. The area was recognized for it’s location near the Missouri River and English Landing Park. It also picked up points for the number of shops, galleries, and the historic train depot found on Main Street. Branson, Mo., did a little better, ranking No. 60 on the list. The ranking included it’s live music theaters, Silver Dollar City, lakes, and Ozark Mountain Christmas that add to its charm. ALSO READ: Trapped ‘birdie’ interrupts play at Overland Park Top Golf location Main Street in St. Charles can be found in the No. 84 spot on the list. The community offers 19th-century brink buildings and a picturesque setting as backdrops for its antique stores, boutiques, and art galleries. Mixbook listed the following cities as those with the most charming Main Streets: - King Street, Charleston, South Carolina - Main Street, Lake Placid, New York - Marin Street, Beacon, New York - Main Street, Montpelier, Vermont - E Las Olas Boulevard, Fort Lauderdale, Florida - Broughton Street, Savanah, Georgia - King Street, Alexandria, Virginia - Broadway Street/Biltmore Ave., Ashville, North Carolina - Washington Avenue, Ocean Springs, Mississippi - Main Street, Eureka Springs, Arkansas ALSO READ: Demand for New Heights hats soars since Taylor Swift wore one at Coachella The complete ranking is available online at https://www.mixbook.com/inspiration/americas-100-most-charming-main-streets.
